properties.name: azure.openai.apikey
properties.description: Azure OpenAI Key. It can be override by the environment variable AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY

properties.name: azure.openai.endpoint
properties.description: Azure OpenAI Endpoint. It can be override by the environment variable AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT

properties.name: azure.openai.deployment.id
properties.description: Azure OpenAI Model Deployment ID. It can be override by the environment variable AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT_ID

properties.name: azure.openai.temperature
properties.description: Azure OpenAI Temperature. It can be override by the environment variable AZURE_OPENAI_TEMPERATURE

properties.name: azure.openai.top.p
properties.description: Azure OpenAI Top P. It can be override by the environment variable AZURE_OPENAI_TOP_P

properties.name: azure.openai.is.gpt4
properties.description: Set if Azure OpenAI model deployed is GPT-4 (true) or GPT-3.5 Turbo (false). It can be override by the environment variable AZURE_OPENAI_IS_GPT4
